title: Ken Ebb
text:
Ken Ebb is an Australian former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played for <a href="Cronulla-Sutherland%20Sharks">Cronulla-Sutherland</a>.
Ebb, an <a href="Engadine%20Dragons">Engadine Dragons</a> junior, played first-grade with Cronulla from 1989 to 1992. In his first two seasons he played off the bench whenever he broke into first-grade, then in 1991 and 1992 he made several appearance as starting lock.
